code.name: create_AIX_zip_unzip.sh
code.code_content:
OSTYPE=$(uname)
if [[ "$OSTYPE" == "AIX"* ]]; then UNZIP=$(find /u01/app/oracle/agent*/*/bin -type f -name unzip|tail -n 1) ZIP=$(find /u01/app/oracle/agent*/*/bin -type f -name zip|tail -n 1) cd ${HOME}/dba_code/bin ln -s ${UNZIP} unzip ln -s ${ZIP} zip fi
